# profiles

Additional profiles configuration.

::: warning

Only paid accounts can set multiple profiles beside the default one.

Refer to the [profiles guide](../guide/user/profiles.md) for further details.

:::


**Type:** list of (submodule)

**Default:** `[ ]`
